group_1.textLeft: Hey, look at this.
That one idol girl quit after a pushy bikini@modeling gig.

group_1.textRight: Wow... This is pretty scary, isn't it?@She was just an innocent school idol.

group_1.textCenter: (My manager is also concerned about it...)

group_1.textLeft: (In this office, idols can work with peace of mind...)

group_1.textRight: Ah, glad you could make it, Sayuki.@Say, are you opposed to wearing a swimsuit?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh...?!@A s-s-s-s-swimsuit?

group_1.textRight: Don't want to? Then, I suppose we have to decline@that kind of work...

group_1.textLeft: N-no! That's not it...!
(If my manager suggested it, then the gig probably@isn't that sketchy...)
(It'll be a normal swimsuit with proper defenses,@right...?)

group_1.textRight: Um, for summer work, I was thinking we should@sell some swimsuit merchandise.
So, if you have any preferences for what you want@to wear...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah?!
Yes, yes yes!
The swimsuit...@Could I design it myself?!

group_1.textRight: Eh?@That's not a problem, but...

group_1.textLeft: Then, I'll do it!@I won't leave it up to other people!
(If I design it myself, the chance it will be something@weird...)
(Is zero!)

group_1.textCenter: (If you keep your chin up, then nothing can go@wrong...)
(But ideas for a swimsuit...@Nothing comes to mind at all...)

group_1.textRight: Um... Sayuki?
Is something wrong? You've had this gloomy look@for a while now...

group_1.textLeft: M-Mayuuu! Please save meee...

group_1.textRight: A swimsuit design, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Yes... I've been thinking day and night, but haven't@come up with a single idea...

group_1.textRight: I see. That's really difficult...
I'd love to help you, so let's put our heads@together...!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much~! I get it now, I just needed@a little help from a friend.

group_1.textRight: Let's see, since you're a sword idol...
How about using something related to that@as a motif?

group_1.textLeft: Then for the swimsuit...@What should I...
Ah, then I'll design it around armor!
[chara:303301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yep, yep!@Copper circles, short fins, neck cloth~!
Tadaa!@The first design sketch is done~!

group_1.textRight: Wow, what beautiful blue armor...!@Sengoku era style, right?

group_1.textLeft: You got it in one!@This...this looks so cool!

group_1.textRight: But, um...@How is this a swimsuit?

group_1.textLeft: This is practically just armor!@If you tried to swim, you'd drown!
I'll have to learn how to swim in armor just like@in the old days...!

group_1.textRight: ...You guys, what in the world are you talking about@in a family restaurant?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, um...@Hey, Rita! How are you?

group_1.textRight: My name is Ria Ami!! Honestly, how many times@must I correct you...
Anyways, why are you drawing armor...
Are you going to a culture event?

group_1.textLeft: No, this is... an idol outfit... for the beach...

group_1.textRight: That's supposed to be a swimsuit?!@That is way too avant-garde!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're right~@It's not a good design at all...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* Good grief.
I know you want it to be Japanese styled, but not@everyone shares your hobbies!
Here's a popular magazine I was in...
I'll show you some swimsuit designs I modeled@for it!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Rita...!

group_1.textRight: Let's see, for an idol's swimsuit outfit...@Something to use as a base, huh?
...Perhaps, like this...@No, maybe like this...
...[wait:0.8][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]Alright, it's flawless!@[chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:cheek_0:motion_100]As expected of me. This one is perfectly wonderful!

group_1.textLeft: A-amazing...@It's a perfectly ordinary swimsuit~!

group_1.textRight: You can base this part on the armor motif from@before...

group_1.textLeft: Sword Idol Sayuki's swimsuit is almost done!

group_1.textRight: Um, well maybe... we could put a little flower@decoration around here...

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll put a braid here...

group_1.textRight: You guys, have a little moderation!@It just became armor again...!

group_1.textCenter: O-ohh...[chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303301:lipSynch_1] It's completed!@For me...this is the perfect swimsuit!
I couldn't have done it without you...
I'll slash my way into your heart, your blade-bearing@beauty, Sayuki Fumino! Cutting in!
This year...we're gonna have a very nice summer!
